MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Hillpark Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:56am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:22pm on the 6th of November 2020
